data.title: Oracleâ€™s Siebel Clinical Trial Management System (CTMS)
data.meta_description: Effectively manage critical clinical trial activities.
data.text:
The only platform that truly unifies people, processes, and data to simplify and accelerate the clinical trials of the future.

Clinical One Data Collection goes beyond electronic data capture, allowing you to collect datasets from any source and harmonize them in a single place.

Clinical One RTSM can support a randomization strategy for the simplest to the most complex studies without the need for programming or coding.
